meanings.definition: A drug used to treat breast cancer.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed tamoxifen to help fight the cancer.
meanings.sent2: She takes tamoxifen every day as part of her cancer treatment.
meanings.sent3: The bottle of tamoxifen pills danced around the room, pretending to be a superhero.
meanings.sent4: Like a shield, tamoxifen protects the body from the invading cancer cells.
meanings.sent5: The bright pink color of the tamoxifen pills reminded her of the hope they brought.

meanings.sent1: Doctors often tamoxifen breast cancer to help patients recover.

meanings.sent3: The nurse playfully suggested that they should tamoxifen the cancer away like magic.
meanings.sent4: Using tamoxifen is like sending a powerful army to battle against cancer.
meanings.sent5: Her decision to tamoxifen was a brave step towards fighting the disease.
